attributes.name: append-to
attributes.desc: which element the tooltip CONTENT appends to

attributes.name: effect
attributes.desc: Tooltip theme, built-in theme: dark / light

attributes.name: content
attributes.desc: display content, can be overridden by slot#content

attributes.name: raw-content
attributes.desc: whether content is treated as HTML string

attributes.name: placement
attributes.desc: position of Tooltip
attributes.optionValue: top | top-start | top-end | bottom | bottom-start | bottom-end | left | left-start | left-end | right | right-start | right-end

attributes.name: fallback-placements
attributes.desc: list of possible positions for Tooltip popper.js

attributes.name: visible
attributes.desc: visibility of Tooltip

attributes.name: v-model:visible
attributes.desc: visibility of Tooltip

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.desc: whether Tooltip is disabled

attributes.name: offset
attributes.desc: offset of the Tooltip

attributes.name: transition
attributes.desc: animation name

attributes.name: popper-options
attributes.desc: popper.js parameters

attributes.name: arrow-offset
attributes.desc: Controls the offset (padding) of the tooltip’s arrow relative to the popper.(2.9.10)

attributes.name: show-after
attributes.desc: delay of appearance, in millisecond

attributes.name: show-arrow
attributes.desc: whether the tooltip content has an arrow

attributes.name: hide-after
attributes.desc: delay of disappear, in millisecond

attributes.name: auto-close
attributes.desc: timeout in milliseconds to hide tooltip

attributes.name: popper-class
attributes.desc: custom class name for Tooltip's popper

attributes.name: enterable
attributes.desc: whether the mouse can enter the tooltip

attributes.name: teleported
attributes.desc: whether tooltip content is teleported, if true it will be teleported to where append-to sets

attributes.name: trigger
attributes.desc: How should the tooltip be triggered (to show)

attributes.name: virtual-triggering
attributes.desc: Indicates whether virtual triggering is enabled

attributes.name: virtual-ref
attributes.desc: Indicates the reference element to which the tooltip is attached

attributes.name: trigger-keys
attributes.desc: When you click the mouse to focus on the trigger element, you can define a set of keyboard codes to control the display of tooltip through the keyboard

attributes.name: persistent
attributes.desc: when tooltip inactive and persistent is false , popconfirm will be destroyed

attributes.name: aria-label
attributes.desc: same as aria-label(a11y)

methods.name: isFocusInsideContent
methods.desc: validate current focus event is trigger inside el-tooltip-content

methods.name: onOpen
methods.desc: expose onOpen function to mange el-tooltip open state

methods.name: onClose
methods.desc: expose onClose function to mange el-tooltip open state
